# id: PreparedStatementCreator -> PreparedStatement createPreparedStatement(Connection con) throws SQLException_
commentText: Create a statement in this connection. Allows implementations to use_PreparedStatements. The JdbcTemplate will close the created statement._@param con Connection to use to create statement_@return a prepared statement_@throws SQLException there is no need to catch SQLExceptions_that may be thrown in the implementation of this method._The JdbcTemplate class will handle them.
